name: COMMONWEALTH ex. rel. Joseph B. SAMPLE v. Robert SHANNON, Superintendent, SCI-Frackville, Appeal of Joseph B. Sample
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex. rel. Sample v. Shannon

parties: COMMONWEALTH ex. rel. Joseph B. SAMPLE v. Robert SHANNON, Superintendent, SCI-Frackville, Appeal of Joseph B. Sample.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of May, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
827 A.2d 385
COMMONWEALTH ex. rel. Joseph B. SAMPLE v. Robert SHANNON, Superintendent, SCI-Frackville, Appeal of Joseph B. Sample.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 21, 2003.
